TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem ToolboxItemCreatorCallback(object serializedObject, string format);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用匹配此委托类型创建的工具箱项从工具箱上的特定剪贴板数据任何的格式对象的方法签名的方法签名实现工具箱项创建者方法。You can implement a toolbox item creator method with a method signature matching the method signature of this delegate type that creates a toolbox item from any object of a particular clipboard data format placed on the toolbox. 例如，你可以设计创建工具箱项创建者来存储文本从剪贴板粘贴到工具箱。For example, you can design a toolbox item creator that creates a to store text pasted to the toolbox from the clipboard. 你可以使用方法添加特定的数据类型到工具箱的事件处理程序。You can use the method of the to add a event handler for a particular data type to the toolbox. `serializedObject`参数都包含数据对象。The `serializedObject` parameter contains the data object. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例提供了使用一个组件添加"Text"数据格式处理程序，或，向工具箱。The following example provides a component that uses the to add a "Text" data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 传递任何文本数据粘贴到工具箱中，到自定义拖放到窗体上，数据创建者回调委托创建包含文本。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)]
